creator: Fun Games Studio.inc
descriptionHtml:
4x4 Mountain climb car stunt game is an addictive driving simulator car racing game in which you drive big and bolder mountain climb 4x4 trucks and car simulator.
4x4 mountain climb off-road vehicle simulator car game is a realistic motor cross physics of car game, you need to take a risk to climb the mountains hills and overcome the obstacles by off-road vehicles. 4x4 mountain climb has tow different modes mountain climb and off-road race. mountain climb 4x4 truck game has easy to use of controls and addictive game play.
you have to reached soon as possible at the highest hill of mountains by collecting coins and complete all stages carefully. you can drive freely in the area, don't worry about damages, you can upgrade and and repairs your dream vehicles by collecting and achieving the stages. 4x4 mountain climb is fully adventure car racing driving simulator car games. 4x4 mountain climb car game is online and offline free game for you.
Features:
-: An environment of 4x4 truck mountain climbs games is totally realistic and easy to play.
-: 8 different customize cars in which you upgrade speed and handlings.
-: Modifying some specifications of cars such as handling and speed.
-: Chance of changing the color appearance of cars.
-: High-quality and ever -changing environment models.
-: Addictive nature that will attract you more
-: different actions that come with new update.
download this free game of mountain climbs 4x4 game and share your experience in comments.
